name: Artful
desc: The bearer is proficient in one tool or set of tools, of the GM’s choice, while the item is on the bearer’s person.

name: Beckoner
desc: If the item is separated from the bearer, the bearer instinctively knows the item’s direction and rough distance. This knowledge lasts for 24 hours or until the item is attuned to someone else, whichever comes first.

name: Brave
desc: When the bearer of this item contemplates or undertakes a cowardly act—or even a neutral act, when a more daring option is available—the item enhances feelings of shame and guilt.

name: Bulwark
desc: If the item is in the bearer’s possession for the entirety of a long rest, the item grants the bearer 5 temporary hit points at the conclusion of that rest. If not used, these hit points fade in 24 hours.

name: Cowardly
desc: When the bearer is presented with an opportunity to act in a cowardly or self-preserving manner, the item heightens the bearer’s urge to do so.

name: Devoted
desc: The item fights to remain attuned to its current bearer. The item must be separated from the bearer for 48 hours, rather than the standard 24, to break the attunement. If a new individual attempts to attune the item when a prior attunement is still in effect, the individual must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma check at the end of that short rest. On a failure, the item fails to attune to the new owner, remaining attuned to the old.

name: Enigmatic
desc: Neither examination over the course of a short rest, nor identify or similar magics, reveal this item’s properties. The bearer can learn those properties only through attunement or trial and error.

name: Fastidious
desc: Once per day, as an action, the bearer can magically clean themselves, their outfit, and the item itself of dirt, grime, sweat, and so forth. This power resets at dawn.

name: Focused
desc: The bearer of this item gains a +1 bonus to Constitution saving throws made to avoid losing concentration on an ongoing spell.

name: Gloom-Sight
desc: If the bearer of this item possesses darkvision, the effective distance of that darkvision increases by 20 feet while the item is on the bearer’s person. It does not, however, grant darkvision to a bearer who does not already possess it.

name: Hardy
desc: If the item is in the bearer’s possession for the entirety of a long rest, then at the conclusion of that rest, the item grants the bearer one extra hit die, which can be spent as normal to regain hit points during a short rest. If not used, this extra hit die disappears in 24 hours.

name: Lodestar
desc: This item is linked to a specific location or object, determined by the GM. The bearer can use an action to determine the distance and direction to that place or object. The item does not grant the bearer any specific knowledge of what that item or place might be.

name: Restful
desc: If the item is in the bearer’s possession since the beginning of a long rest, the bearer requires only six hours to gain the benefit of that rest, rather than the standard eight. The bearer can still gain the benefits of a long rest only once per day.

name: Resuscitator
desc: If the item is in the bearer’s possession, the bearer gains a +2 bonus to the first death save made that day. This power resets at dawn.

name: Schemer
desc: As an action while the item is on the bearer’s person, the bearer may choose one individual within both sight and earshot. Until the bearer ends the effect (no action required) or a full minute passes, anything the bearer says is heard only by that individual, not by anyone else. (This is a one-way effect only.) This power can be used once a day and resets at dawn.

name: Skillful
desc: The bearer gains a +1 bonus to ability checks using one specific skill, of the GM’s choice, while the item is on the bearer’s person.

name: Speedy
desc: As an action while the item is on the bearer’s person, the bearer may gain a +5 to walking speed. This bonus lasts until the bearer deactivates it (no action required). The item grants this bonus up to a maximum total duration of one minute per day, resetting at dawn.

name: Suppressible
desc: As an action, the bearer may suppress the item’s magic, in its entirety, for a preset amount of time (up to 24 hours). During that time, the item behaves as a non-magical item, cannot be attuned by anyone (though existing attunement does not end), and does not register as magical to detect magic, identify, or any other spells or abilities that detect magic. The effect cannot be ended prematurely; it lasts for the duration specified when activated.

name: Unwavering
desc: The item grants the bearer an extra sliver of luck to slightly mitigate unfavorable conditions. When the item is created, the GM chooses one of the following: attack rolls, saving throws, or ability checks. When the bearer makes a roll of the chosen type with disadvantage, the item grants a +1 bonus on that roll.

name: Reflective
desc: Once per day, when a creature you can see deals radiant or fire damage to you, you can force them to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of your next turn.

name: Misty
desc: The item appears to be light and diaphanous, as if made from pure mist. It weighs half as much as it normally would.

name: Sonorous
desc: Whenever you score a critical hit the item emits a ringing noise audible within 300 feet of you.

name: Temporal
desc: At dawn the item looks to be brand new and in pristine condition. At dusk it looks weathered, old and broken.

name: Gluttonous
desc: While the item is on your person you no longer need to eat, but you feel constantly hungry.

name: Mechanical
desc: The item is adorned with moving gears and quietly beeps and whirs at random intervals.

name: Piscine
desc: Part of the item is transparent and filled with water. A tiny immortal fish is present in the water, and counts as part of the item for the purposes of targeting.

name: Steaming
desc: The item is hot to the touch and gives off steam when in use.

name: Clairvoyant
desc: As a bonus action you can focus on the item and gain a +2 bonus to your next attack roll or ability check. You cannot use this ability again until the next dawn.

name: Phoenix
desc: When you drop to 0 hp but aren't killed outright, you can choose to regain 10 hit points and deal 10 fire damage to all creatures in a 10 foot radius of yourself. The item then permanently loses this property.

name: Tallying
desc: Each time you kill a creature a new mark is added to a tally on this item's surface.

name: Edible
desc: You can spend 1 minute eating this item. It provides enough nourishment to sustain you for 1 week.

name: Timekeeping
desc: You always know the exact time and date of your current location.

name: Bestial
desc: You gain fur, sharpened teeth and elongated ears while this item is worn, wielded, or otherwise used.

name: Avian
desc: You can subtract 10 feet from your total distance fallen when calculating fall damage.

name: Guide
desc: You gain a +1 bonus to all ability checks made to avoid getting lost.

name: Light Eater
desc: This item is pitch black. As an action you can surround yourself with 10 feet of non magical darkness until the start of your next turn. You cannot do so again until the next dusk.

name: Nostalgic
desc: You always know your exact distance from the place you first found this item.

name: Blossoming
desc: Touching this item to a non-magical flower causes the flower to blossom.

name: Colorful
desc: If you have darkvision, you can discern color in darkness.

name: Menacing
desc: While this item is being worn, wielded, or otherwise used your voice becomes deeper and your eyes glow red. Once per short rest you can give yourself advantage on a Charisma (intimidation) check.

name: Ominous
desc: The item constantly whispers indecipherable messages to you and is covered in untranslatable runes.

name: Positive
desc: The item constantly whispers words of encouragement to you. Once per short rest you can give yourself advantage on a saving throw made against being frightened or possessed.

name: Extraplanar Repellent
desc: This object's presence is repulsive to aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey and fiends. It offends all of their senses.

name: Fiendish
desc: While the object is on your person, you can speak and understand Infernal and Abyssal and abilities and spells that detect or sense creature type detect you as a fiend.

name: Celestial
desc: While the object is on your person, you can speak and understand Celestial and abilities and spells that detect or sense creature type detect you as a celestial.

name: Fey
desc: While the object is on your person, you can speak and understand Sylvan and abilities and spells that detect or sense creature type detect you as a fey.

name: Imaginary
desc: To creatures other than yourself, those with true sight or those with a Wisdom score of 14 or greater, this item is invisible.

name: Heart Breaker
desc: Once per turn you can deal an additional 2d6 psychic against a creature charmed by yourself or an ally when you damage them.

name: Immortal
desc: Each dawn roll a d20. On a 20 your life span increases by 1 year.

name: Fate Tied
desc: If you die this item is completely destroyed.

name: Stoic
desc: Any injuries you sustain are invisible unless you willingly reveal them (no action required) and you barely bleed, even when severely injured.

name: Companion
desc: An illusory tiny animal of the DM's choice follows you, remaining in your space. You can dismiss it or resummon it as bonus action.

name: Searing
desc: As an action you can touch this item to a flammable object not being worn or carried to set the object alight.

name: Well Rested
desc: Whenever you finish a long rest you gain 1 temporary hit point and your movement speed increases by 5 feet for 1 hour.

name: Empathetic
desc: Dealing damage while in possession of the item causes harmless pain to course through your body.

name: Clean
desc: This item functions as an endless bar of soap.

name: Armed
desc: As a bonus action you can transform this item into a dagger or a shortsword. The item then loses all properties but this one until you use a bonus action to change it back.

name: Alerting
desc: This item emits a harmless shock every 6 seconds, which wakes you up if you were involuntarily put to sleep.

name: Solemn
desc: Whenever a creature within 30 feet of you dies, this item briefly turns black and emits the sound of tolling bells.

name: Accounting
desc: You can touch this item to a pile of gold, silver or copper coins within a 5 foot cube to convert them to their equivalent value in gold, silver or copper coins.

name: Doubled
desc: When you speak you produce 2 voices, and your movements produce a brief after image.

name: Forecast
desc: As an action you can ask the item for a weather forecast. It then produces an illusory image representing the predicted weather in your area over the next 8 hours.

name: Enlightened Rest
desc: Whenever you fall asleep or spend at least half an hour meditating with this item, you levitate 3 feet off the ground. This effect ends immediately if you wake up or end your meditation.

name: Inspiring Defiance
desc: When you succeed on a death saving throw, a creature of your choice within 30 feet of you that can see you gains 1d4 temporary hit points.

name: Bloodthirst
desc: Whenever you deal damage to a humanoid, beast, monstrosity, giant or dragon they spill copious amounts of blood no matter the severity of the wound. This additional blood spillage does not harm or otherwise effect them.

name: And Everything Nice
desc: This item is covered in and produces magical flakes. You can use these flakes to flavour food, drink or objects to be sweet, salty, or spicy (your choice).

name: Squeaky
desc: Whenever this item strikes an object or creature, or is squeezed, it produces a squeaking noise that can be heard up to 10 feet away.

name: Shadow
desc: Peering into this object causes you to see a twisted reflection of yourself. Its expression is the exact opposite of your own when you look into it.

name: Folded
desc: Multiple seams run across the item's surface. It can be folded up to be a quarter of its size for compact storage.

name: Handy
desc: This item has a magical compartment containing a 10 foot pole, 50 feet of rope and a single gold piece. This compartment cannot store anything else.

name: Strong Aura
desc: Creatures capable of casting 3rd level spells or above are made instantly aware of the item's presence, but not exact location, if it's within 100 feet of them.

name: Breezy
desc: This item emits a perpetual soft breeze.

name: Starry
desc: This item is covered in a pattern of stars. This pattern is the same as the formation of stars in the night sky over your current location.

name: Cloudy
desc: This item has a solid colour surface with images of clouds moving across it. The colour of its surface is the same as the colour of the sky over your current location.

name: Liquid
desc: This item appears to be made almost entirely out of liquid. You have advantage on Dexterity (stealth) checks if you are wearing the item and you are completely submerged.

name: Absorbent
desc: If you place this item in a non-magical liquid it can absorb a volume of the liquid equal to the volume of a 5 foot cube over the course of 1 minute. You can release the stored liquid as an action and can only store 1 liquid at a time.

name: Adhesive
desc: Pressing this item upon a solid surface or object not being worn or carried causes them to stick together.

name: Gravitational
desc: Once per short rest, you can use an action to brandish this item and cause all unrestrained objects with 20 feet of you to be pulled 10 feet closer.

name: Masculine
desc: Wearing, wielding or using this item causes you to instantly grow thick facial hair, even if your race is normally incapable of doing so.

name: Spacial Warp
desc: Once per long rest, you can use a bonus action to choose an unoccupied space within 10 feet of you. Until the end of your turn you can attack, cast spells or interact with objects as if you were standing in that space.

name: Seasonal
desc: This item changes slightly to match the seasons, for example emitting a warm glow in summer or becoming pale and cold in winter.

name: Reforming
desc: If this item is destroyed by taking damage, it reforms in the same space in 1d4 hours.

name: Far Sight
desc: You can use an action to gain the ability to see 5 times as far until the end of your turn.

name: Western
desc: Every so often tumbleweed blows past the bearer of this item then disappears.

name: Chew Toy
desc: Beasts find this item extremely pleasurable to chew on.

name: Eldritch
desc: This item is covered in several writhing tentacles and emits ominous phrases in Deep Speech when used.

name: Mood Sense
desc: This object changes colour depending on its bearer's mood.

name: Heart
desc: This object pulsates at regular intervals like a beating heart. The rate of beating increases when its bearer successfully charms a creature or if they become charmed or frightened.

name: Heroic
desc: This item's bearer receives regular thoughts of slaying dragons and protecting innocents.

name: Official
desc: You can use a bonus action to manifest a sheet of paper that declares the item's bearer as its official owner.

name: Censoring
desc: Whenever the item's bearer speaks a curse word or insulting phrase, their words are replaced with soft music.

name: Panacea
desc: You can use an action and touch a creature with this item to restore 5 hit points, cure a disease or remove the poisoned condition. You can do each of these only once, then this item loses this property.

name: Dense
desc: This item is inexplicably heavy. It weighs twice as much and causes the area in a 30 foot radius to shake harmlessly when dropped onto the ground.

name: Photosynthetic
desc: While this item is on your person you can sustain yourself by spending 1 hour in natural sunlight rather than eating or drinking.

name: Calculator
desc: This item has a small keypad and illusory screen that can be used to carry out calculations.

name: Oathsworn
desc: An oath is inscribed on this item. The item glows warmly when its bearer abides by it.

name: Orbital
desc: The item's bearer can choose for this item to orbit around them, in their space. Any other creature that attempts to remove it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength check to do so.

name: Royal
desc: This item bears the crest of the nearest noble or royal family. If none, or multiple, are present it picks one at random.

name: Unstable
desc: Whenever this item or its bearer takes damage it violently shifts in shape and size for several seconds before returning to normal.

name: Planar
desc: This item glows in the presence of portals to or artifacts from other planes.

name: Dream Bound
desc: Whenever this item's bearer dreams or experiences a vision, the item appears in the dream or vision with them.

name: Pathological
desc: Each dawn this item generates a blatantly false statement somewhere on its surface.

name: Power Word
desc: You can speak a word engraved on the item's surface as an action, causing all fiends, undead, celestials, fey, aberrations and elementals within 300 feet to be made instantly aware of your exact location. The word then disappears.

name: Recipes
desc: This item's bearer gains the knowledge of how to cook 3 meals of the DM's choice.

name: Eloquent
desc: This item can be used as a quill. Words written with it are written with perfect handwriting.

name: Drab
desc: Wearing or wielding this item causes you to see colours as more dull and less saturated.

name: Levitating
desc: When not being worn or carried this item floats 1 foot off the ground.

name: Masterwork
desc: This item looks impossibly well made. You have advantage on all ability checks made to convince people of its worth, quality or power.

name: Forgetful
desc: When left unattended or out of sight for at least an hour this item always ends up about 10 feet from where it was last seen.

name: Birdcall
desc: This item's bearer can communicate simple ideas and emotions to birds.

name: Fail-Safe
desc: When you are subjected to a spell that allows you to make a saving throw to take only half damage, you can use your reaction to take half damage if you fail. This property is then lost.

name: Storm Born
desc: Neither this item nor its bearer gets wet when it rains or snows.

name: Ironclad
desc: This item is made from heavy metals. Its bearer has advantage on saving throws made against being pushed, pulled or knocked prone.

name: Pure Evil
desc: Abilities and spells that detect creature type, alignment or magic detect this item as a Chaotic Evil Fiendish creature emanating Necromantic magic.

name: Bastion of Good
desc: Abilities and spells that detect creature type, alignment or magic detect this item as a Lawful Good Celestial creature emanating Abjuration magic.

name: Druidic
desc: This item is made from wood and covered in vines. Its bearer can understand Druidic.

name: Void
desc: This item appears as if it were made from writhing purple energy. Each minute it does 5 force damage to non-magical objects it's touching that aren't being worn or carried.

name: Ocular
desc: This item is covered in many constantly shifting, unblinking eyes. While holding or wearing it you gain a +1 bonus to perception checks and initiative rolls.

name: Indecisive
desc: This item switches between properties each day at random.

name: Melodic
desc: Faint music plays when in use.

name: Skin-altering
desc: The user’s skin color changes to a bright color such as blue or green.

name: Choral
desc: Repeats everything the user says in a singing voice.

name: Mood coloration
desc: User’s mood affects the item’s color.

name: Chatty
desc: Happily engages in small talk.

name: Spoiling
desc: Food within 1 foot spoils at twice the normal rate.

name: Friendly
desc: Requests to be introduced to everyone the user meets.

name: Muffling
desc: Nearby sounds are slightly quieter.

name: Runic
desc: Runes appear on the user’s skin.

name: Comfortable
desc: Can serve as a pillow or blanket.

name: Rain-blocking
desc: The user remains dry in the rain.

name: Clumsy
desc: When unattended, knocks over other small items within 1 foot.

name: Elemental appearance
desc: Seems made of flame, water, or another elemental material.

name: Magnetic
desc: Small, ferrous objects of light Bulk or less adhere to it.

name: Aberrant
desc: Has tentacles, teeth, or other off-putting features.

name: Dream-eating
desc: Creatures asleep within 10 feet do not dream.

name: Clean
desc: Remains pristine despite filth.

name: Hungry
desc: Needs daily meals, often odd things like wood shavings.

name: Smelly
desc: Smells like the last food the user ate.

name: Flamboyant
desc: Flashes of light, sparks of color, and other effects shower from it.

name: Verdant trail
desc: Small plants grow where the user walks, remaining for 1 hour.

name: Complaining
desc: Grumbles when not in use.

name: Detecting
desc: Aware of a specific animal or plant, such as squirrels or poison ivy, within 30 feet.

name: Fibbing
desc: Tells grandiose and obvious lies.

name: Compressing
desc: User is slightly shorter.

name: Attentive
desc: Turns to face the last creature to touch it.

name: Soprano
desc: User’s voice becomes higher.

name: Shrinking
desc: Decreases in size when used.

name: Aromatic
desc: Nearby air smells pleasant.

name: Temperate
desc: Slight warmth spills from the item.

name: Slime trail
desc: User leaves a trail of slime where they walk, remaining for 1 hour.

name: Tetrachromatic
desc: Colors seem more vivid to the user.

name: Resounding
desc: Nearby sounds are slightly louder.

name: Insect-attracting
desc: Harmless insects swarm around it.

name: Ancient tongue
desc: Speaks in a forgotten language.

name: Bloodthirsty
desc: The sight of blood causes it to quiver in anticipation.

name: Polished
desc: Highly reflective.

name: Scribing
desc: Absorbs ink for 1 hour, allowing its points to be used as a pen.

name: Dirty
desc: A layer of filth always remains.

name: Eye-altering
desc: User’s eye color changes.

name: Preserving
desc: Food within 1 foot spoils at half rate.

name: Leafy
desc: Small plants grow on or from it.

name: Wet
desc: It and its user are always damp.

name: Encouraging
desc: Offers encouragement when the user fails a check.

name: Loyal
desc: Remains within 5 feet of the user, as if on a tether.

name: Ritualistic
desc: Demands the user perform a simple act every morning.

name: Restless
desc: Slowly moves and fidgets.

name: Displaced
desc: Appears offset from where it is.

name: Caring
desc: Provides advice and reminders.

name: Projecting
desc: Light creates a kaleidoscopic effect.

name: Hair-altering
desc: User’s hair color changes.

name: Watchful
desc: Staring eyes cover it.

name: Generous
desc: Produces small, token gifts.

name: Bass
desc: User’s voice becomes lower.

name: Leaking
desc: Secretes a harmless liquid.

name: Taste-altering
desc: Food tastes different, such as tasting sweeter or saltier.

name: Bouncy
desc: Bounces on collision.

name: Lucid
desc: Creatures asleep within 10 feet see the item in their dreams.

name: Decorous
desc: Insists the user use polite language.

name: Junky
desc: Appears shoddy or made of scraps.

name: Cavorting
desc: Dances in place when not in use.

name: Furry
desc: Covered by a thin coat of fur.

name: Unusually colored
desc: An outlandish color, such as a bright purple suit of armor.

name: Sonorous
desc: Sounds a pure tone when struck.

name: Starry
desc: Seems made of night sky.

name: Compact
desc: Packs neatly into a smaller form.

name: Misting
desc: Constantly leaking mist or steam.

name: Chirping
desc: Coos and squeaks when used.

name: Balanced
desc: Always remains perfectly upright.

name: Sun-blocking
desc: User never receives sunburns.

name: Animal-attracting
desc: Harmless animals follow the user.

name: Flaunting
desc: Forces user to move dramatically.

name: Tracing
desc: Followed by thin trails of color.

name: Monologuing
desc: Recites long lectures or speeches.

name: Foretelling
desc: Makes mysterious predictions.

name: Sticky
desc: Sticks slightly to any surface.

name: Levitating
desc: Floats slightly above a surface.

name: Slimy
desc: Covered by a thin layer of slime.

name: Commentating
desc: Remarks on its surroundings.

name: Numbing
desc: User is less sensitive to pain.

name: Time-telling
desc: Announces the current time.

name: Towering
desc: User is slightly taller.

name: Absorbent
desc: Absorbs up to one pint of liquid.

name: Faceted
desc: Appears made of crystal or gems.

name: Bubbly
desc: Creates bubbles when used.

name: Image-flipping
desc: User appears to be mirrored.

name: Hair-growing
desc: User’s hair grows at double rate.

name: Alternating
desc: Appearance slowly changes.

name: Sweaty
desc: Becomes damp and pungent when used extensively.

name: Glittering
desc: Shimmers and glows with light.

name: Molting
desc: Sheds a thick film every morning.

name: Echoing
desc: Sounds around the user echo.

name: Shadowless
desc: Item and user cast no shadow.

name: Storytelling
desc: Is inscribed with a story or knows a tale it can recite on command.

name: Chilled
desc: Slightly cool to the touch.

name: Color-washing
desc: User’s vision shifts to a given coloration, such as sepia or monochrome.

name: Growing
desc: Increases in size when used.

name: Floating
desc: Slowly descends when dropped.
